clusterList.phrase: it wasn't a long conversation or anything
i called him talked to him briefly to see how he was doing
it was just a mindless rant emotions were running a bit high i've been in to apologise and we're friends again
it was quite awkward to begin with but now we're really good friends so we can look back on it and laugh but it was uncomfortable at the time
if i could get a message to him i would say that i didn't mean to cause such a stir
thomas saw me and we were just talking about the game and as i was walking off he congratulated me i didn't really know what he was talking about and then he kind of smiled and i figured it out
